title: Kidney & Liver Profile Blood Test
subtitle: Comprehensive organ function test
description: Dual-organ assessment panel evaluating liver enzymes, synthetic function, and detoxification capacity alongside kidney filtration markers and electrolyte balance.
tests_include: Liver Function Panel (ALT, AST, ALP, GGT)
suitable_for: Family history of kidney or liver disease
preparation: Fasting required. Avoid acetaminophen and alcohol 24 hours prior. Report all medications and supplements.
